card_text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Machina" monster in your GY, except "Machina Possesstorage"; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but it cannot activate its effects this turn. You can target 1 other "Machina" monster you control and 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; return them to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Machina Possesstorage" once per turn.
